summary: very simple sound overhaul of the main menu
descriptionHtml:
[color=#999999][size=4]
[/size][/color][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4]
[/size][size=6][i]C[/i]a[i]j[/i]a[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999]
[color=#666666][i]composed by Björn Pankratz[/i][/color][size=3][i][color=#666666] [/color]


[/i][/size][/color][/font][color=#666666] 
[/color][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][color=#666666]           "Caja is a Mage of the Berserker.
            She is on the move to improve her magical abilities.
           The hero meets her in the dome city in Abessa (on Elex), where she can join him as a companion."[/color]





This is a very simple sound overhaul of the main menu.
Since the music is very important to me, I decided to share it with you.

[color=#666666]After downloading the ZIP file, unpack the archive
and copy it to your Skyrim / Data directory.  (Save the original: mus_maintheme)
Simple, for free . . .[/color]


My other mod link:  [/i][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/11889623?tab=about+me]clauda[/url][i]
My Elex [/i][/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i]Images:  [/i][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/elex/users/11889623?tab=images]invictus[/url][i]
Elex on nexus: [/i] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/elex]elex[/url][i]

[/i][/size]
[color=#666666][size=3][color=#999999][color=#666666]ELEX OST[/color][/color][i][color=#999999][color=#666666] – "Caja"  /  Elex soundtrack composed by Björn Pankratz    [/color][/color]
